channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: A lot of litter all along the verge of A40 (west bound), 11th July
item.description:
Looks like someone just dumped a skip along the entire road
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 2 Gloucester Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dumped swivel chair, 11th July
item.description:
See photo. Dumped chair. Been in this position for a week.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Alstone House Arle Avenue, Cheltenham

item.title: Water leak, 11th July
item.description:
Water leak, outside no.'s 33 / 35 Queens Road
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 35 Queen's Road, Cheltenham

item.title: Hole in pavement, 11th July
item.description:
Queens Road - few metres from exit from railway station car park. Close to brick wall with railings on top. Hole in tarmac pavement - looks to be a void below pavement surface.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 71 Queen's Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dangerous Road Surface, 10th July
item.description:
The road surface between the main road and the turn off to Wigmoor to is in very poor condition. A serious accident occurred here today when a cyclist came off his bike as a result of this requiring the attendance of the emergency services. This accident would of been avoidable if the surface had been maintained.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Haydon Stoke Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Single Track Road - Potholes along the Length in the Vehicle track positions, 10th July
item.description:
The road is the Cleeve Common Road - well used to get to Cleeve Common. It is a single track road where potholes - deep and sharp edged - are at points along this road from the Burnt Oak Crossroads to the Pylons Carpark. The point marked is about halfway and is intended to get the WHOLE length of the road survey please can the potholes along this length be filled in as they are only getting worse and damage to veicles has already been seen.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Cleeve Common, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Abandoned Waitrose shopping trolley, 10th July
item.description:
Dumped in river Chelt on honeyborne way. Trolley wise don't pick up Waitrose trolleys.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 16c Millbrook Gardens, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Deteriorating bicycle unclaimed for circa 2 years, 10th July
item.description:
This bicycle has been locked to a bike stand, outside the Dept of Hope Joy and Wonderment on Andover Road for around two years. It is rusted, has a buckled back wheel and looks unridable. Given no-one has claimed it in all this time, please could it be removed as it is now an eyesore? Many thanks.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 42 Andover Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Street Lamp down, 10th July
item.description:
Street lamp in Chapel Hay Park has fallen down/been knocked down.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 3 Vicarage Close, Gloucester

item.title: Road, 8th July
item.description:
Many potholes are appearing in Snowdon gardens now,could do with patching also the gutters are full of weeds could do with clearing.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 75 Snowdon Gardens, Gloucester

item.title: Road vehicle damage to footpath, 8th July
item.description:
Two potential ankle twisting, or child falling off bike bits of damage on the footpath on Roman Hackle Avenue opposite Limber Hill. Obviously done by a road vehicle.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 14 Arkle Close, Wymans Brook
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: The ‘brown’ tourist information signs, are now a disgusting faded green., 8th July
item.description:
The Tourist information signs, which I believe started off as brown, are now a very faded, almost illegible pale green. Not very encouraging.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): A40, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Cracked water stop cover on pavement., 8th July
item.description:
Has cracked in two and can split and fall into the recess. This creates a significant hazard to pedestrians. The cover is for number 11.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 11 Rivelands Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Drop curb required for wheelchair immobility access on the footpath that crosses Dunster Grove, 8th July
item.description:
Drop curb required for wheelchair immobility access on the footpath that crosses Dunster Grove. For mobility scooter access It would be good to have someone consider this footpath and allowing access for wheelchairs and mobility scooters on an aging estate.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 80 Springbank Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Drop curb and removal of barriers For mobility scooter access top of Springbank Road, 8th July
item.description:
For mobility scooter access top of Springbank Road It would be good to have someone consider this footpath and allowing access for wheelchairs and ability scooters on an aging estate

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 80 Springbank Road, Cheltenham

item.title: Broken glass shards on road, 7th July
item.description:
Broken glass on road. Could easily puncture car or bicycle tyres.
